ygData.subject: RE: Chief Goonda  (was:RE: Hey this sounded interesting ..)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aye. I conned them all warmly. Of course, from where I was, Chief Goonda was standing behind the temple and I didn t see him to con him. I was wondering
ygData.messageBody:
> > > I really think your connection speed is playing a huge factor
> > > in this. How the h*ll does a bard die 4 times in one night
> > > passing through outdoor zones?
> >
> >You've obviously never met Chief Goonda and tried to recover
> >your corpse from his "range of aggrivation". If you read my
> >example closely, you'll note that only the first pass was my
> >"run through the zone". The others were me trying to recover
> >my corpse from a spot surrounded by pissed off Ogre's. I even
> >had invisibility cast on me by the only player willing to help
> >in the zone. They saw through it.
>
> Chief Goonda, man do I how him a dozen or so deaths. Me and
> a group of friends foolishly tried to take on that ogre camp
> one night and then spent the next 4 hours getting all of our
> corpses back :) And this was when shamans still had charm.
> I died 4 times that night, ick.

Aye. I conned them all warmly. Of course, from where I was,
Chief Goonda was standing behind the temple and I didn't see
him to con him. I was wondering why Ogre's conned warmly to
me - figured there had to be something there so I ran up
to one.

LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...
